author: niallp
msg: Add support the new 'resource' and 'bundle' attributes for Variables in Commons Validator 1.2.0 (see Bug #32522). Variables can now be localized - for example the format of a date can be put in the message resources and the key specified in the validator config.

Also missing variables now cause validation to fail with a standard "System Error" message shown to the user and details of the problem logged. Previously validation just passed with no indication there was any kind of problem.

author: erodriguez
msg: Split the hierarchy of records.  The behavior of question and resource records is fundamentally different.

author: jboynes
msg: specifically initialize the SSL algorithm to the JVM's default

author: erodriguez
msg: Removed an old comment that no longer applied.
